exam.question: The newspaper did not mention the ________ of the damage caused by the fire.

answer.explain: the extent of the damage： 损失的程度。句意： 报纸没有提及这次火灾造成的损失的程度。range： 范围， 幅度； level： 水准， 级别； quantity： 数量。

sentences.sContent: They examined the extent to which (= how much ) age affected language-learning ability.
sentences.sCn: 他们调查了年龄会在多大程度上影响语言学习能力。

sentences.sContent: (= how much ) did she influence his decision?
sentences.sCn: 她在多大程度上影响了他的决定？

sentences.sContent: ...To what extent are Americans really willing to endure the environmental impacts of domestic energy production in order to cut back imports...
...If you're too concerned with outcomes to the extent that you manipulate and intimidate others toachieve those outcomes...
...providing information about the extent to which biology influences mind...

phrases.pCn: 有几分，在某种程度上；在一定程度上
达到……的程度以致；就……来说；在这个意义上；在这样的范围内；在……方面来说
在一定程度上；到达…程度
最大限度地，到极点；极力地
